entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
